title: Global Macro Tactical Asset Allocation Model

issues.title: Asset class definitions missing
issues.description: 'equities, bonds, commodities, alternatives' mentioned but no specification of what instruments represent each
issues.suggested_fix: Define: Equities = MSCI ACWI, Bonds = Bloomberg Global Agg, Commodities = Bloomberg Commodity Index, Alternatives = specify exact instruments

issues.title: Economic indicators not specified
issues.description: 'economic indicators' referenced but no list of which indicators
issues.suggested_fix: List specific indicators: GDP growth, inflation (CPI), unemployment rate, PMI, yield curve, etc.

issues.title: Technical analysis methodology not defined
issues.description: 'technical analysis' mentioned but no specification of indicators or rules
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: Moving average crossovers (50/200 day), RSI thresholds, or other specific technical indicators with parameters

issues.title: Sentiment measures not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: AAII Sentiment Survey, VIX level, put/call ratios, or other specific sentiment indicators

issues.title: Significant signal levels not defined
issues.description: 'significant levels' is subjective without numerical thresholds
issues.suggested_fix: Define: 'Significant when composite signal exceeds ±1.5 standard deviations from historical mean'

issues.title: Signal combination methodology missing
issues.description: Multiple signal types mentioned but no formula for combining them
issues.suggested_fix: Provide formula: Composite_Signal = w1×Economic + w2×Technical + w3×Sentiment, with weights specified

issues.title: Weight change magnitude not specified
issues.description: 'Weight changes' but doesn't specify how much allocation shifts
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Allocation shifts by 10% of portfolio toward highest-signal asset class'

issues.title: Rebalancing frequency not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Rebalance monthly on first business day' or other specific frequency

issues.title: 'Where appropriate' criteria not defined
issues.description: Derivatives usage conditional on 'appropriate' without defining criteria
issues.suggested_fix: Define: 'Use futures when transaction costs < 15 bps vs physical securities or for leverage efficiency'

issues.title: External manager not identified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: Name external manager or define 'complex trades' that trigger external manager consultation

issues.title: No approval process for manager consultation
issues.description: External manager involvement mentioned but no governance around this decision
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'External manager consultation requires CIO approval for trades exceeding $10M notional'

issues.title: Baseline asset allocation not specified
issues.description: TAA model without specifying neutral/strategic allocation
issues.suggested_fix: Define neutral allocation: 'Strategic baseline: 40% equities, 35% bonds, 15% commodities, 10% alternatives'

issues.title: Asset allocation bounds not specified
issues.description: No min/max limits on asset class weights

issues.title: Data frequency not specified
issues.description: Economic and technical data update frequency not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Economic indicators updated monthly, technical indicators daily, sentiment weekly'

issues.title: No leverage or derivatives limits disclosed
issues.description: Mentions derivatives but no disclosure of leverage limits or derivatives exposure caps
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Maximum gross exposure 150% of NAV. Derivatives notional limited to 100% of portfolio value'

notes: Severely underspecified across all dimensions - requires comprehensive revision
